text: Claridge Hotel entrance. The Claridge Hotel is a five-star hotel in the city of Buenos Aires, Argentina. Established in 1946, it was designed by architect Arturo Dubourg. Nowadays it is operated by Eurostars Hotels. ==References== ==External links== Category:Hotels in Buenos Aires Category:1946 establishments in Argentina Category:Hotels established in 1946 Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1946 Category:San Nicolás, Buenos Aires
title: Claridge Hotel, Buenos Aires
